doc.title: Attagasam
doc.plot: Ajith plays twins separated at birth, Jeeva and Guru. While Jeeva lives with his mother and is a driving instructor, Guru has become a gangster. Their mother sent Guru away in his childhood as he had witnessed his father's murder. The twins meet by accident and swap places. First Guru is angry at his mother for giving him away but as he learns the truth he decides to fight to right the injustice.
